英文法規名稱: Regulations on the Reporting of Fishing Operations of Foreign Flag Fishing Vessels Invested by Nationals of the Republic of China
中文法規名稱: 投資經營非我國籍漁船作業資料申報辦法
沿革內容:
1.The full text of 4 articles promulgated by the Council of Agriculture, Executive Yuan on October 16, 2009, under Order No. Nong-Yu-Tsu 0981335220.
2.Article 3 amended by the Council of Agriculture, Executive Yuan on March 27, 2017 under Order No. Nong-Yu-Tsu 1061333787.

法規內容.條文內容: These Regulations are established pursuant to Article 5, paragraph 2 of the Act to Govern Investment in the Operation of Foreign Flag Fishing Vessels.

Any national of the Republic of China that has been authorized to invest in or operate a foreign flag fishing vessel fishing in sea areas beyond national jurisdiction shall report, in electronic or written form, between 1 and 28 February every year its fishing operations of the preceding year to the competent authority.
These Regulations shall be effective upon promulgation.
